title: Man In the Mirror
author: Michael Jackson
lyrics:
[00:09.78] I'm gonna make a change
[00:12.75] For once in my life
[00:18.10] It's gonna feel real good
[00:20.83] Gonna make a difference
[00:22.84] Gonna make it right
[00:27.86] As I, turn up the collar on
[00:31.89] My favorite winter coat
[00:34.08] This wind is blowin' my mind
[00:37.80] I see the kids in the street
[00:40.59] With not enough to eat
[00:42.26] Who am I, to be blind pretending not to see their needs?
[00:48.44] A summer's disregard
[00:50.89] A broken bottle top
[00:53.59] And a one man's soul
[00:57.33] They follow each other on the wind ya know
[01:01.60] 'Cause they got nowhere to go
[01:04.96] That's why I want you to know
[01:07.69] I'm starting with the man in the mirror
[01:12.77] I'm asking him to change his ways
[01:16.89] And no message could've been any clearer
[01:21.24] If they wanna make the world a better place
[01:23.60] Take a look at yourself and then make a change
[01:28.20] 
[01:36.41] I've been a victim of a selfish kind of love
[01:41.09] It's time that I realize
[01:44.51] That there are some with no home
[01:47.42] Not a nickel to loan
[01:49.30] Could it be really me pretending that they're not alone?
[01:55.03] A willow deeply scarred
[01:57.75] Somebody's broken heart
[02:00.10] And a washed out dream (washed out dream)
[02:04.42] They follow the pattern of the wind, ya see
[02:08.82] 'Cause they got no place to be
[02:12.15] That's why I'm starting with me
[02:14.52] I'm starting with the man in the mirror (oh)
[02:19.56] I'm asking him to change his ways (oh)
[02:23.90] And no message could've been any clearer
[02:28.19] If you wanna make the world a better place
[02:30.45] Take a look at yourself and then make a change
[02:33.78] I'm starting with the man in the mirror (oh)
[02:38.19] I'm asking him to change his ways (oh)
[02:42.75] And no message could've been any clearer
[02:46.94] If you wanna make the world a better place
[02:49.44] Take a look at yourself and then make that
[02:52.24] Change
[02:53.24] I'm starting with the man in the mirror (oh yeah)
[02:57.98] I'm asking him to change his ways (better change)
[03:02.34] No message could've been any clearer
[03:06.51] (If you wanna make the world a better place)
[03:08.97] (Take a look at yourself and then make the change)
[03:11.42] (You gotta get it right, while you got the time)
[03:13.52] ('Cause when you close your heart) you can't
[03:15.04] (Then you close your) close your, your mind
[03:18.46] With the man in the mirror, oh yeah
[03:22.07] I'm asking him to change his ways (better change)
[03:26.69] No message could've been any clearer
[03:30.68] If you wanna make the world a better place
[03:32.82] Take a look at yourself and then make a change
[03:37.30] 
[03:43.42] (Oh yeah) gonna feel real good now
[03:50.68] 
[03:54.98] I'm gonna make a change
[03:58.58] It's gonna feel real good
[04:00.30] Come on (change)
[04:03.20] Just lift yourself
[04:04.86] You know
[04:06.53] You've got to stop it
[04:08.46] Yourself (yeah)
[04:11.32] (Make that change)
[04:12.95] I've got to make that change today
[04:16.15] (Man in the mirror) you got to
[04:19.98] You got to not let yourself brother
[04:23.67] (Yeah) you know
[04:26.06] (Make that change) I've got to get that man, that man
[04:30.97] You've got to
[04:32.36] You've got to move
[04:34.22] Come on
[04:35.21] Come on
[04:36.85] You got to
[04:38.24] Stand up, stand up (yeah, make that change)
[04:40.38] Stand up
[04:41.65] Stand up and lift
[04:43.59] Yourself, now
[04:44.82] (Man in the mirror)
[04:47.65] 
[04:52.58] (Yeah, make that change)
[04:55.73] Gonna make that change come on
[04:58.89] (Man in the mirror)
[05:00.75] You know it
[05:02.63] You know it
[05:03.77] You know it
[05:05.17] You know
[05:07.86] Change
[05:11.06] Make that change
